attributes.action: give the disabled a winter fuel payment like OAPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think disabled people should also get a winter fuel payment like the over 60's. They have to keep warm as well, and usually on less income. Please sign here and see if we can get the goverment to help.
thanks

rejection.details:
There are several petition already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MakeHeatFair/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
